import React from"react";/** Presentational component for showing bootstrap-style alerts.
 *
 * { LoginForm, SignupForm, ProfileForm } -> Alert
 **/import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Alert(_ref){let{type="danger",messages=[]}=_ref;console.debug("Alert","type=",type,"messages=",messages);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`alert alert-${type}`,role:"alert",children:messages.map(error=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"mb-0 small",children:error},error))});}export default Alert;
